description.full: Local Multiplayer 2, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-8, HD (High Definition). Ready for more? Upgrade to the full version of Shred Nebula and unlock all three game modes, 40 total levels, achievements, leaderboards, and one immersive storyline to carry it all along. Like multiplayer? Team up with friends in co-op mode, or pilot one of eight unique ships – each with its own weapons, specials, and strengths – for the deep-space dogfight of your life! It’s just another day on the edge of the Shred. This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: RIP into the galaxy! Shred Nebula is a top-down, fast-paced ship combat game with gloriously rendered environments and intuitive controls. Follow the story through 22 levels of Adventure Mode, take on 100 waves of enemy fighters in Score Attack, or challenge friends and rivals alike to an interstellar dogfight! From the Crimson Zone to the deadly gravitational barrier known as The Shred, the mysteries of our galaxy wait to be revealed. Can you succeed where an entire fleet once failed?
